name: Climb Up!!
description:
Climb up!! Is an easy to learn but hard to master casual game. Just simply tap to grab the rocks and climb to the top! But watch your steps and don't fall off.
Increase your jump power and stamina by upgrading as you play. Find the best paths to go and avoid the obstacles. Improve your record each time and go for the highest score.

-Great time killer
-Clean and simple art style
-Tons of upgrades
-Casual but tricky at the same time
